attributes.additional_details:
We would like to see  new regulations brought in that  monitor the activities of the animal rights movement which would include the way in which they advertise,the information they give out to the media forcing them to prove that the facts they give out are accurate and genuine and also the way in which they protest so they do not interfere with a persons right of choice.

Part of those regulations should make it a criminal offence to harass the public choosing to visit circuses as well as the way in which they protest outside  venue's at which circuses visit.

If we do not bring in various legislation that will limit  these groups and control their actions  to keep them within the law our human right to make our own choices to own pets, to choose what we eat and our human right of choice to visit entertainment attractions that include the use of animal's.
